title: Just 6% of Workers Are Planning to Take Advantage of This Prime Investment Opportunity
text: The stock market has experienced unprecedented volatility in recent months, and this is likely to continue as the country officially enters a recession and COVID-19 cases spike across the country.

title: What June’s job report may imply about the U.S. economic recovery
text: Although some investors remain optimistic, others believe that once the economy has reopened, the underlying recession will be evident with the rising number of unemployed from jobs being lost permanently. US Economist at TS Lombard Steven Blitz joins The Final Round panel to discuss.

title: Hedge Fund Marshall Wace Will Bet On ESG Stocks With New $1 Billion Fund
text: The hedge fund's new strategy is the latest sign that investors increasingly believe markets will punish companies that aren’t environmentally friendly. This could be "a major turning point," according to JP Morgan analysts.

title: Investors Bearish As The Stock Market Soars
text: Thursday’s jobs report, like the rest of the data last week, was better than expected. Stocks moved higher to finish the quarter on a strong note.

title: It's going to be 'an uphill battle' to keep the economic expansion going: Economist
text: Diane Swonk, Grant Thornton's Chief Economist, joined The Final Round to discuss the June jobs report and gave her outlook for the US economy amid reopenings.

title: Why June jobs report is a 'mishmash': Economist
text: The U.S. economy regained millions more jobs in June from May, as regions across the country eased social distancing restrictions and allowed more businesses to reopen.

title: Stocks To Watch: Postmates, Walgreens And Cannabis Plays
text: Welcome to Seeking Alpha's Stocks to Watch - a preview of key events scheduled for the next week.

title: 8 Stock Market Predictions for the Second Half of the Year

title: Gearing Up to Invest During Our Current Recession? Ask Yourself These 3 Questions First
text: Now's a great time to invest -- if you go about it the right way.

title: Weekly High Frequency Indicators: Is The 'Wisdom Of The Crowd' That The Economic Cost Of The Pandemic, While Ghastly, Is Becoming More Tolerable?
text: High frequency indicators can give us a nearly up-to-the-moment view of the economy.

title: S&P 500 Weekly Update: The Rally Continues For This 'Market Of Stocks'

title: Federal Reserve Watch: Fiscal Policy Concerns
text: The Federal Reserve continues along in its efforts to keep the financial markets from convulsing into a real liquidity crisis.
